title: Big Boss 13: Fans Are Angry At Siddharth Shukla For 'Outburst', Call Rashami Desai A ‘Tigress'!
text:
They have known each other for professional reasons but that isn't showing in the bond between Sidharth Shukla and Rashmi Desai.

Their bond has time and again gone for a toss in a way that they are clearly not on the same page on Bigg Boss 13.

Just to give you a closer look at things, it was on Day 9 before the second luxury budget task that the entire house started arguing over 'rotis' and why they weren't thin. While majorly everyone was involved in the heated exchange, things turned really bitter between Sidharth Shukla and Rashami Desai.

The person who was at the center of the argument was Devoleena but the entire spotlight shifted to Sidharth and Rashmi who started arguing and fighting.
